name: Apple Mac Studio M2 Ultra
description: Ultimate creative workstation powered by M2 Ultra chip with 24-core CPU and 76-core GPU. Features 64GB unified memory, 1TB SSD, Thunderbolt 4 ports, and whisper-quiet thermal design.

reviews.review_text: Renders 4K video like it's nothing. Absolute beast.
Silent operation even under heavy ML training loads.
Expensive but pays for itself in productivity gains.
